alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Walton, Holmes and north central Washington Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1144 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, De Funiak Springs, Union, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Hinsons Crossroads, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Tendil Crossing, Darlington, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, Holland Crossroads, Center Ridge, Smith Crossroads and Hickory Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
